Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
A server initiate a connection between some client and link them with a remote view Each player that connect is put into a lobby When there are enough players to play the game start

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deregisterConnection​(Connection connection)
    It removes a Connection from the server The connection is removed from the list and removed from playingConnection
    void drawAGod​(java.util.List<GodCard> godsDeck, java.util.List<GodCard> godInGame)
    It receive the deck and the subDeck It draws a card from deck and add it to the subDeck
    static Server getInstance​(int port)
    Singleton constructor If it do not exist it create a new one
    Model getModel()
    Used from connection to call the disconnection method when a player disconnect
    java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPlayersName()
    Return the name of all player in waiting room to avoid have players with same name
    void initGame()
    Set the turn on first player, than create a random list of 2 or 3 god cards and update the turn to the second player Ask the second player what god he want to use and send a wait message to the 1st and 3rd players.
    void lobby​(Connection connection, java.lang.String name)
    The lobby receives a connection and a name Those are put in waitingConnection When there are 2 or 3 players in the waiting connection the game is set up and it starts
    void run​(int port)
    The servers starts and waits for clients to connect When a client join a server it is registered (save connection) and it's connection is started in a asynchronous thread
    static void setNumberOfPlayers​(int number)
    Set up the number of players It is received from the first remoteView
    void setUpFirstPlayer()
    The first player who join the lobby is asked for how much players he want to play When he answer other players can join the lobby Here are created the model, the controller and the remote view and all are linked up

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Server getInstance​(int port) throws java.io.IOException
      Singleton constructor If it do not exist it create a new one
      Returns:
      an instance of server
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if can't send object into the socket

    • getPlayersName

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPlayersName()
      Return the name of all player in waiting room to avoid have players with same name

    • setNumberOfPlayers

      public static void setNumberOfPlayers​(int number)
      Set up the number of players It is received from the first remoteView

    • getModel

      public Model getModel()
      Used from connection to call the disconnection method when a player disconnect
      Returns:
      the model

    • run

      public void run​(int port)
      The servers starts and waits for clients to connect When a client join a server it is registered (save connection) and it's connection is started in a asynchronous thread

    • deregisterConnection

      public void deregisterConnection​(Connection connection)
      It removes a Connection from the server The connection is removed from the list and removed from playingConnection
      Parameters:
      connection - the connection to remove

    • lobby

      public void lobby​(Connection connection, java.lang.String name)
      The lobby receives a connection and a name Those are put in waitingConnection When there are 2 or 3 players in the waiting connection the game is set up and it starts

    • setUpFirstPlayer

      public void setUpFirstPlayer()
      The first player who join the lobby is asked for how much players he want to play When he answer other players can join the lobby Here are created the model, the controller and the remote view and all are linked up

    • initGame

      public void initGame()
      Set the turn on first player, than create a random list of 2 or 3 god cards and update the turn to the second player Ask the second player what god he want to use and send a wait message to the 1st and 3rd players.

    • drawAGod

      public void drawAGod​(java.util.List<GodCard> godsDeck, java.util.List<GodCard> godInGame)
      It receive the deck and the subDeck It draws a card from deck and add it to the subDeck
      Parameters:
      godsDeck - the deck
      godInGame - the subDeck
